titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1495) to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct various projects for improvements to rivers and harbors of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-288, by Ms. Matsui.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 1495 with 1 hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 99.

action.text: Considered as privileged matter. (consideration: CR 8/2/2007 H9503-9507)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 597.
The previous question was ordered without objection. (consideration: CR 8/2/2007 H9507)

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR 8/2/2007 H9503)

bill.summary: 8/1/2007--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1495 (Water Resources Development Act of 2007).
